dict.acceptation: 估计，预测；报价，预算书；评价，判断；
估计，估算；评价，评论；估量，估价；

sent.orig: This paper proposes an estimate and analysis method, and gives a consistent estimate standard estimate frame.
sent.trans: 对我国港口船舶交通管理系统提出建设后评测和分析的方案，规范并统一评测标准。

sent.orig: The purpose of predictive theorem is to estimate system model and estimate future system response.
sent.trans: 预估理论是以估测的系统模型，推估系统的未来反应。

sent.orig: This is an outside estimate of the price, ie an estimate of the highest probable price.
Cost estimate of maintenance manpower is the important part of military aircraft LCC cost estimate.
sent.trans: 维修人力费用估算是军用飞机寿命周期费用估算的重要组成部分。

sent.orig: Each regression coefficient estimate is associated with a scale estimate.
sent.trans: 在给出回归类系数估计的同时，RCMD还提供了尺度参数的估计。
